page.title: 06HOUSEHOLD RECREATION
page.content:
In our area every household has a television. A television is used to watch programs on. Computers can be linked up to televisions. Only three families in this area own computers, the rest either don't want one or can not afford one.
Forty-two families have record players, every family has a radio. Record players are used to play records on, mainly music.
Six families in the area own C.B. radios. These are two way radios which let people talk to each other even if they are a long way away.
